text: Jahan enhen koi khabar aman ya khof ki mili enhon ney ussay mashoor kerna shuroo ker diya halankay agar yeh log issay rasool (PBUH) kay aur apney mein say aisi baaton ki teh tak phonchney walon kay hawalay ker detay to iss ki haqeeqat woh log maloom ker letay jo nateeja akhaz kertay hain aur agar Allah Taalaa ka fazal aur uss ki rehmat tum per na hoti to maddoday chand kay ilawa tum sab shetan kay pairo kaar bann jatay
